Articles.Content: Suddenly, a scientist trips on a pineapple and breaks hos nose.
Quick, put him in the Kraken reactor! The reality disruptions should slow the damage!
(due to severe brain damage, my character will be in a coma until post 700)
We need to stop the fighting
I reconstruct the Citadel, this time cloaked.

Darn it, you old fart! Say something!

Don't make me use it... I will!
Reconstruct it with pure Kinemet, the iron made it unstable

(my character's body dies, but then Xannari remembers seeing a project that was dedicated to bringing human life back from the dead (it will still take until post 700 for this to be completed) call Project Lazarus)
Xannari's in love
Got it.

> 
> (my character's body dies, but then Xannari remembers seeing a project that was dedicated to bringing human life back from the dead (it will still take until post 700 for this to be completed) call Project Lazarus)

[i don't need it when I have the 1771 refined. It's named that for a clever reason]

**Sigh**

Well, a life for a life!

**Activates 1771, and puts it firmly on Sampa's stomach**

If you and me both can't live, then you'll live! If you haven't completed your duty, I know how it feels. If you promise me to protect my lord, then my duty is complete...

**De-activates, having completed the trade**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T22:17:30Z" title="07/13/2015 10:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
(ok, suit yourself, no pun intended)
No denial either
(am I the only starting to cry here?)
Yeah....
No...
My mind sends an impulse to xannari, asking her to wait, that he will still need assisstance with rehab and court martial.
And then they fall in love.......
Yeah....Suddenly pineapples
Sorry... I'm not as strong willed... *I have something to die for...*

> 
> Sorry... I'm not as strong willed... *I have something to die for...*

I have seen otherwise...
I do... One, you know of, the other, I have not told you.
what text?
